statements: SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_id, review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT review_date, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT customer_id, review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT review_id, review_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score < 0.2 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id IN (200, 300) AND review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.3 AND 0.7 ORDER BY review_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM reviews;
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_id, review_date FROM reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT review_id, review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews JOIN sentiment_analysis ON reviews.review_id = sentiment_analysis.review_id WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7;
SELECT review_id, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM reviews GROUP BY review_id HAVING avg_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT review_id, COUNT(*) as num_reviews FROM reviews GROUP BY review_id HAVING num_reviews > 3;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT product_name, price FROM product_details WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, description FROM product_details ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT review_id, sentiment_label, sentiment_confidence FROM review_sentiments;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM customer_reviews GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT product_name, MAX(price) AS max_price FROM product_details GROUP BY product_name ORDER BY max_price DESC;
SELECT r.review_id, r.review_text, s.sentiment_label FROM customer_reviews r INNER JOIN review_sentiments s ON r.review_id = s.review_id;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT review_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT review_id, review_date FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_metadata WHERE brand = 'Example Brand' ORDER BY product_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, age, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE location LIKE '%City%' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT review_id, review_text, sentiment_score FROM customer_reviews WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT product_name, category FROM product_metadata WHERE brand = 'Apple' AND category = 'Electronics'
SELECT customer_id, age, gender, location FROM customer_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age ASC, gender DESC
SELECT cr.review_id, cr.review_text, rs.sentiment_label FROM customer_reviews cr JOIN review_sentiments rs ON cr.review_id = rs.review_id WHERE rs.sentiment_label = 'Positive'
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, review_date FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, review_text FROM product_reviews WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sentiment_id, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM customer_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM customer_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT review_id, customer_id, review_text FROM customer_reviews WHERE customer_id = 102;
SELECT product_name, review_text FROM product_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, preference_name FROM customer_preferences ORDER BY preference_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customer_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8;
